name: Glintstone Pebble
caption:
The most basic glintstone sorcery of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

This is a universal first step on the journey to true knowledge of sorcery.
info:
Shoot a single magic glintstone projectile. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 152
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Great Glintstone Shard
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
info:
Shoot a single magic glintstone projectile. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 202
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Swift Glintstone Shard
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
info:
Quickly shoot a single magic glintstone projectile. Can be cast without delay after performing another action and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 114
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Glintstone Cometshard
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy.
info:
Shoot a magical comet with a trailing tail. Charging increases damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 259
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 324
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Comet
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

The greatest of the Karolos Conspectus's sorceries, that only a very few sorcerers have ever mastered.
info:
Shoot a great magical comet. Charging increases damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 292
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 365
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Shard Spiral
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy. This was the product of a failed attempt to create a new comet.
info:
Shoot twin projectiles that form a spiral as they travel. Charging increases damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 92
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 110
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Glintstone Stars
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Olivinus Conspectus, which attracts sorcerers from Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
info:
Shoot 3 magic shooting stars of varying power which pursue the target. Charging increases damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 68, 78, 87
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 80, 90, 99
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Star Shower
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.



The most difficult to master of the Olivinus Conspectus sorceries.
info:
Shoot 6 magic shooting stars of varying power which pursue the target. Charging increases damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 44, 49, 59, 69, 69, 79
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 53, 58, 63, 68, 78, 88
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Crystal Barrage
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursue the wisdom of stone—the secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.
info:
Shoot a volley of glintstone crystal shards. Charging vastly increases quantity of projectiles. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 36
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Glintstone Arc
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Granted to sorcerers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys, in order to fend off large groups of would-be adversaries. Fools often roam in packs.
info:
Shoot a horizontal arc of magic which spreads outward and can pass through multiple enemies. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 148
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Cannon of Haima
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Drawn from the conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.
info:
Lob a magic projectile which flies in an arc and explodes on impact. Charging increases damage and size of the explosion. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 285
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 332
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Crystal Burst
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursued the wisdom of stone—the secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.
info:
Shoot a burst of glintstone crystal shards. Charging increases damage and speed of projectiles. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 40
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 45
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Shatter Earth
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A Stonedigger sorcery used by the glintstone miners of the crystal tunnel. At the academy, use of this sorcery was a stigma that marked out failed scholars.
info:
Imbue the staff with magic, then thrust it into the ground to create a magical shockwave. Allows one follow-up cast, which will be another quick thrust into the ground to create a larger, more powerful shockwave.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (thrust):</font> 52
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (shockwave):</font> 182
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (second thrust):</font> 68
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (second shockwave):</font> 205
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone, Stonedigger

name: Rock Blaster
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

An enhanced version of the glintstone miners' Stonedigger sorcery.
info:
Imbue the staff with magic. Hold to create a magical drill which you can walk into enemies to inflict continuous magical damage. Release to thrust it into the ground and create a large magical shockwave.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (drill):</font> 64
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (shockwave):</font> 212
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone, Stonedigger

name: Gavel of Haima
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Drawn from the scholarly conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.
info:
Conjure a magical greathammer and slam it down, creating a massive shockwave. Allows one follow-up cast, which will be the same as the first.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (hammer):</font> 297
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (shockwave):</font> 242
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Terra Magica
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Once, the sigil would be cast from the highest belfry of the academy, covering the entire institution's grounds. This spell allows such vivid experience of spell-casting success, it turns many a fledgling into a true sorcerer in a flash of newfound understanding.
info:
Draw an academy sigil upon the ground for 30 seconds, increasing the <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage inflicted</font> by you and allies standing within it by 35%. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Starlight
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Granted to sorcerers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys. Even during the blackest nights, sojourns underground, or imprisonment in gaol, the stars are never far from a sorcerer's side.
info:
Conjure a small, floating star of light which follows you and increases visibility in dark areas for 180 seconds. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Comet Azur
caption:
Legendary sorcery devised by Azur, primeval sorcerer.

A tremendous comet in a torrent akin to the distant starry expanse, the place said to be the origin of glintstone.

When Azur glimpsed into the primeval current, he saw darkness. He was left both bewitched and fearful of the abyss.
info:
Shoot a large beam that inflicts continuous, fluctuating damage. Hold to continue casting. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 55-100
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Primeval Current

name: Founding Rain of Stars
caption:
The eldest primeval sorcery, said to have been discovered by an ancient astrologer. A sorcery of legendary status.

Thought to be the founding glintstone sorcery. The glimpse of the primeval current that the astrologer saw became real, and the stars' amber rained down on this land.
info:
Conjure cosmic clouds above you which rapidly rain down a barrage of magical projectiles in the area for 5 seconds. Charging increases damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 49
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 54
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Primeval Current

name: Stars of Ruin
caption:
Legendary sorcery devised by Lusat, primeval sorcerer.

When Lusat glimpsed into the primeval current, he beheld the final moments of a great star cluster, and upon seeing it, he too was broken.
info:
Shoot 12 dark stars which pursue the target and inflict varying amounts of damage. Charging increases damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 43, 45, 49, or 52
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 54, 57, 60, or 65
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Primeval Current

name: Glintblade Phalanx
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Bestowed upon the enchanted Carian knights, who combined this art with their swordsmanship to maintain pressure upon their foes, striking in waves of steel and sorcery.
info:
Conjure 5 magical dagger projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 60
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade

name: Carian Phalanx
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

An enhanced version of the glintblade sorcery used by enchanted knights.
info:
Conjure 9 magical dagger projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 48
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade

name: Greatblade Phalanx
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Used by the enchanted troll knights. They were the comrades of the young Rennala, bound by oath.
info:
Conjure 3 magical sword projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 100
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade

name: Rennala's Full Moon
caption:
Sorcery symbolic of the Carian queen.

Queen Rennala encountered this enchanting moon when she was young, and later, it would bewitch the academy.
info:
Incarnate a moon, then send it floating forward to explode after 3.5 seconds or on impact. Reduces <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font> of any target hit by the spell by 20% for 60 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 360
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Moon

name: Ranni's Dark Moon
caption:
Legendary sorcery symbolic of the Carian queen.

This moon was encountered by a young Ranni, led by the hand of her mother, Rennala. What she beheld was cold, dark, and veiled in occult mystery.
info:
Incarnate a cold moon, then send it floating forward to explode after 3.5 seconds or on impact. Causes <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> and reduces <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font> of any target hit by the spell by 20% for 60 seconds.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 330
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 270
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Moon

name: Magic Downpour
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Said to have been taught by the Crystalians to mark the swearing of the old concord.
info:
Conjure a mass of magic which shoots 5 sets of 5 small magic projectiles. Charging increases it to 9 sets of 5 small magic projectiles. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 58
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian

name: Loretta's Greatbow
caption:
Sorcery used by Royal Knight Loretta.

It is said that the bow was Loretta's favored weapon.
info:
Conjure a magic greatbow and use it to shoot a magic great arrow which explodes on impact. Hold to keep the magic great arrow nocked. Charging increases damage and size of explosion. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 270
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 330
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Loretta

name: Loretta's Mastery
caption:
Sorcery used by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree.

Developed by Loretta after her long, bloody journey to seek out a place where the Albinaurics could live in peace.
info:
Conjure a magic greatbow and use it to shoot 4 magic great arrows simultaneously which explode on impact. Hold to keep the magic great arrows nocked. Charging increases damage and size of explosion. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 108
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 127
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Loretta

name: Magic Glintblade
caption:
An old sorcery of the Carian royal family.

Said to be the prototype of the sword-phalanx sorceries wielded by royal enchanted knights.
info:
Conjure a sigil overhead, from which a magical dagger projectile appears after a 3 second delay, which then shoots itself at an enemy. Charging increases the delay to 5 seconds and increases the damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 182
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 230
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade

name: Glintstone Icecrag
caption:
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.

The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
info:
Shoot a mass of cold magic. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 199
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 100
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold

name: Zamor Ice Storm
caption:
Ice sorcery of the Town of Zamor.

Cloaked in icy tempests, the knights of Zamor have challenged the Fire Giants since ancient times.
info:
Conjure a large swirl of cold air which will hit enemies 6 times in 2 seconds. Charging increases this to 9 times in 3 seconds, increases the size of the swirl, and increases the magic damage.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 74
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 79
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 80
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold

name: Freezing Mist
caption:
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.

The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
info:
Conjure a cloud of cold air which lasts for 15 seconds and causes <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> 5 times per second. Charging increases size of cloud. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 20
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold

name: Carian Greatsword
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Armed with this spell, sorcerers gain the strength of knights, their loyalty sworn to the moon.
info:
Conjure a large, magical greatsword and swing it horizontally. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 268
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Carian Sword

name: Adula's Moonblade
caption:
Sorcery of Adula, the Glintstone Dragon.

Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.
info:
Conjure a large, magical, icy greatsword and swing it horizontally, which launches a large horizontal arc of icy magic. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (greatsword):</font> 243
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectile):</font> 235
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (greatsword):</font> 120
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (projectile):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold, Carian Sword

name: Carian Slicer
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Even among the Carian sword sorceries, this is a notably effective technique.
info:
Conjure a small, magical blade and swing it horizontally. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 180
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Carian Sword

name: Carian Piercer
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

This sorcery forms a counterpart to Carian Greatsword. Highly lethal when used against single foes riding alone.
info:
Conjure a large, magical ice greatsword and thrust it forward. Charging increases damage and extends the reach of the thrust. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 287
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 355
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Carian Sword

name: Scholar's Armament
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 75% of casting armament's sorcery scaling value as <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> for 90 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Scholar's Shield
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.
info:
Enchant left-hand armament. Increases <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> by 20%, reduces <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage received</font> from blocked attacks by 70%, and reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> from blocked attacks of any other type by 30% for 60 seconds. The amount that <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> is increased by depends on the shield's base guard boost. Shields with a lower base value will get a bigger increase, while shields with a higher base value will get a smaller increase. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Lucidity
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

The Carian knights never waver.
info:
Alleviate all <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font> and <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font>. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian

name: Frozen Armament
caption:
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.

The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Causes 63 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> per attack for 60 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold

name: Shattering Crystal
caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

The Crystalians are inorganic beings, yet they live. They cleave close to the ideals of the primeval current, and as such, they are revered guests of the sorcerers.
info:
Shoot a barrage of crystal shards in a cone-shaped pattern, which inflict varying amounts of damage. Charging increases damage and speed of projectiles. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 51, 60, or 127
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 67, 75, or 160
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Crystalian

name: Crystal Release
caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

This sorcery is used by high-ranking adepts among the Crystalians. Some also call this sorcery "the Crystal Sun."
info:
Conjure a mass of crystal shards above you, which then continuously shoot downward a in a cone-shaped pattern around you for 2.5 seconds. You are unable to move for the entire duration of this. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 100
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Crystalian

name: Crystal Torrent
caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

The wrath of the Crystalians encapsulated in sorcery. Each shard is of substantial size, making even a stray blow capable of inflicting a severe wound.
info:
Shoot a barrage of crystal shards in a straight line. Hold to continue casting. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 57
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Crystalian

name: Ambush Shard
caption:
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.
info:
Quickly conjure a magic projectile behind an enemy which then shoots towards them. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 146
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night

name: Night Shard
caption:
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.
info:
Quickly shoot a small magic projectile. Can be used without delay after performing another action, repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 111
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night

name: Night Comet
caption:
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.
info:
Shoot a magic projectile. Charging increases damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 230
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 276
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night

name: Thops's Barrier
caption:
The lifelong pursuit of Thops the Bluntstone.

Future generations will learn. They will know the foolishness of the sneering sorcerers who ridiculed this theory, little realizing that it was in fact a discovery worthy of a new conspectus of the academy.
info:
Conjure a very brief magic forcefield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Hold to cast repeatedly. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone

name: Carian Retaliation
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

This was the Carian royal family's secret means to prepare against the disloyalty of the academy. The moon and stars would one day go their separate ways.
info:
Conjure a very brief void to absorb a single enemy sorcery or incantation projectile and turn it into 3 magical dagger projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 115
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade

name: Eternal Darkness
caption:
Forbidden sorcery of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

Originally a lost sorcery of the Eternal City; the despair that brought about its ruin made manifest.
info:
Conjure a very large void above you which pulls in most enemy sorceries and incantations for 9 seconds. Only 1 void per caster can exist at a time. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night

name: Unseen Blade
caption:
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

Used by Sellian assassins to present themselves as unarmed sorcerers.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Makes armament completely invisible for 45 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night

name: Unseen Form
caption:
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

The Sellian assassins considered every option that aided their dirty work.
info:
Become semi-invisible for 30 seconds, reducing the range at which non-aggressive enemies will notice you by 60%. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night

name: Meteorite
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.

This sorcery originates from the Onyx Lords, who had skin of stone, and were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.
info:
